stimulusHtml: A long wire experiences a current to the left as shown. Which of the following correctly identifies and justifies the direction of the magnetic field at Point P?
choicesHtml: The magnetic field is directed into the page because by the right-hand rule, when the current is to the left, the magnetic field is into the page at all locations around the wire.
The magnetic field is directed out of the page because by the right-hand rule, when the current is to the left, the magnetic field is out of the page at all locations around the wire.
The magnetic field is directed into the page because by the right-hand rule, the magnetic field below the wire is into the page.
The magnetic field is directed out of the page because by the right-hand rule, the magnetic field below the wire is out of the page.
